prompt: A chibi-style character in greyscale construction paper cut-out aesthetic, flat shapes with sharp edges and minimal shading, on transparent background. The face is solid black with no features. The body is in a front-facing centered standing pose with one hand raised holding an ethereal lantern, other hand in contemplative gesture, chibi proportions with large multi-faceted crystalline head resembling a shifting merkaba structure suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth. Hair or geometric crystalline appendages incorporating hexagonal_matrix, fractal_water_crystal patterns from sacred geometry symbolism. Outfit is unique: neutral grey and neutral grey fluid draped garments with wave geometric patterns with flat with sharpie-style lines for flow and depth, elaborate with shifting Water element curved motifs and descending patterns and vesica_piscis emblem on chest; texture flat with sharpie-style lines for depth. Include subtle accessory like caduceus of communication with intertwined geometric serpents with ethereal spiraling energy emanations. Environmental effect: sacred geometric field creating geometric aura patterns around the character with subtle magical essence emanations like rippling water wisps and droplet particles. Emulate construction paper layering style exactly, but make this visually unique based on Governor ADVORPT's profile: 'She who silently watches', Aethyr TEX, Water element, Tarot The Hermit, Sephirot Hod, Zodiac Virgo, embodying the essence: 'In ADVORPT's presence, an unseen sentinel seems to be watching quietly a patient, observant hush tha...' Resolution 512x512, optimized for layering in Enochian Cyphers game and WebGL rendering with TAP hypertoken metadata embedding.

visual_elements.pose: front-facing centered standing pose with one hand raised holding an ethereal lantern, other hand in contemplative gesture
visual_elements.head_shape: large multi-faceted crystalline head resembling a shifting merkaba structure
visual_elements.body_style: angular geometric body with crystal-like facets, flattened with sharpie-like crease lines
visual_elements.motion_quality: suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth

outfit.base: fluid draped garments with wave geometric patterns
outfit.texture: flat with sharpie-style lines for flow and depth
outfit.details: Water element curved motifs and descending patterns
outfit.magical_essence: rippling water wisps and droplet particles

visual_elements.accessory: caduceus of communication with intertwined geometric serpents
visual_elements.environment_effect: sacred geometric field with faint aura lines

profile_data.title: 'She who silently watches'
profile_data.essence: In ADVORPT's presence, an unseen sentinel seems to be watching quietly a patient, observant hush that safeguards each secret and respects every boundary.
profile_data.angelic_role: Throne of Silent Vigil; marshals tideborn heralds.
profile_data.form_description: A translucent water-crystal form that shifts between solid and liquid states, representing the liminal threshold between manifestation and potential. Virgo's analytical precision meets water's adaptive nature.
profile_data.color_reasoning: Silvery blue represents water's mystical depth and Hod's mercurial intelligence; pearl white symbolizes hidden wisdom and the reflective quality of silent observation
profile_data.geometry_reasoning: Hexagonal structures echo sacred water crystals, fractal patterns represent infinite knowledge containment
